statements: SELECT * FROM support_calls ORDER BY call_timestamp DESC;
SELECT call_id, call_duration FROM support_calls WHERE call_duration > '1 hour';
SELECT call_timestamp, call_duration FROM support_calls WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM call_timestamp) = 1;
SELECT call_id, call_timestamp FROM support_calls ORDER BY call_id LIMIT 5;
SELECT call_id, call_timestamp, call_duration FROM support_calls WHERE call_duration IS NOT NULL;
SELECT call_id, call_timestamp, call_duration FROM support_calls WHERE call_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY call_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM support_calls WHERE call_duration > '1 hour' ORDER BY call_duration ASC;
SELECT call_timestamp, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM call_timestamp) AS call_month FROM support_calls GROUP BY call_month ORDER BY call_month;
SELECT call_id, call_duration FROM support_calls WHERE call_duration >= '30 minutes' AND call_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-06-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY call_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(call_id) AS total_calls, AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM call_duration)) AS avg_duration_seconds FROM support_calls;
SELECT * FROM timestamps;
SELECT id, call_timestamp, duration FROM timestamps ORDER BY call_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM support_calls WHERE staff_id = 101;
SELECT AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM duration)) AS avg_duration FROM timestamps;
SELECT id, start_timestamp, end_timestamp FROM support_calls WHERE end_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM timestamps WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, call_timestamp, duration FROM timestamps WHERE call_timestamp > '2021-01-01';
SELECT call_id, staff_id, start_timestamp, end_timestamp FROM support_calls WHERE staff_id = 100 ORDER BY end_timestamp DESC;
SELECT start_timestamp, end_timestamp, staff_id FROM support_calls WHERE staff_id IN (101, 102) AND start_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-02-28';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS call_count, AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM duration)) AS avg_duration FROM timestamps INNER JOIN support_calls ON timestamps.id = support_calls.call_id;
SELECT * FROM timestamps;
SELECT id, call_duration, timestamp FROM timestamps ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT staff_id, call_id, schedule_date FROM scheduling WHERE staff_id = 101;
SELECT staff_id, availability FROM staffing WHERE availability = true;
SELECT id, staff_id, call_id FROM scheduling ORDER BY schedule_date ASC, staff_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM timestamps WHERE call_duration > 10 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT DISTINCT staff_id FROM scheduling WHERE schedule_date = '2023-06-15'
SELECT id, staff_id FROM staffing WHERE availability = true
SELECT MIN(call_duration) AS min_duration, MAX(call_duration) AS max_duration FROM timestamps
SELECT * FROM timestamps INNER JOIN staffing ON timestamps.id = staffing.id
SELECT * FROM timestamps;
SELECT call_timestamp FROM timestamps ORDER BY call_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM call_durations WHERE duration_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM support_call_schedule JOIN timestamps ON support_call_schedule.timestamp_id = timestamps.timestamp_id;
SELECT staffing_id, schedule_id FROM support_staffing ORDER BY staffing_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM timestamps JOIN call_durations ON timestamps.timestamp_id = call_durations.duration_id;
SELECT * FROM support_call_schedule JOIN support_staffing ON support_call_schedule.schedule_id = support_staffing.schedule_id;

SELECT * FROM support_call_schedule JOIN timestamps ON support_call_schedule.timestamp_id = timestamps.timestamp_id JOIN call_durations ON support_call_schedule.duration_id = call_durations.duration_id;
SELECT timestamp_id, call_timestamp FROM timestamps WHERE call_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY call_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM support_staffing JOIN support_call_schedule ON support_staffing.schedule_id = support_call_schedule.schedule_id WHERE support_call_schedule.timestamp_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM calls;
SELECT agent_id, agent_name FROM agents;
SELECT call_id, call_timestamp, call_duration FROM calls WHERE call_duration > INTERVAL '1 hour';
SELECT count(*), date_trunc('day', call_timestamp) FROM calls GROUP BY date_trunc('day',call_timestamp);
SELECT agent_id, shift_start, shift_end FROM agents ORDER BY agent_name DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT * FROM schedules JOIN agents ON schedules.agent_id = agents.agent_id JOIN calls ON schedules.call_id = calls.call_id WHERE agents.agent_name = 'Alice' AND calls.call_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY calls.call_timestamp DESC;
SELECT metric_id, total_calls, total_duration FROM metrics WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_calls DESC, total_duration ASC;
SELECT agent_name, shift_start, shift_end FROM agents WHERE shift_start < shift_end ORDER BY agent_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM holidays WHERE holiday_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY holiday_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM schedules s LEFT JOIN agents a ON s.agent_id = a.agent_id LEFT JOIN calls c ON s.call_id = c.call_id WHERE s.scheduled_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY s.scheduled_time ASC;
